course_title: Topics in Computer Science: Design Studio in HCI
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 4
class_notes:
This course is the same as the Human-Computer Interaction course that Dr. Wall taught in Spring 23. Students who took the Spring 23 course may not take this one.


Prerequisite: CS 253


Department permission required, please email bnflood@emory.edu.


In this course, students 1) will become acquainted with the human-centered design process, 2) will put the human-centered design process into action through design sprints with different technologies, and 3) will produce a portfolio of their designs throughout the semester.
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Pre/co-requisites vary with topic.
